name: places/ChIJu4KPUZRYwokRh5I9FCynA5A
formattedAddress: 47 E 77th St Suite 201, New York, NY 10075, USA
adrFormatAddress: 47 E 77th St Suite 201, New York, NY 10075-1730, USA

originalText.text: OMG, that doctor is very rough. My representative was right there but he doesn’t care. I have both knees and neck surgery. He twisted my knees and ask me to walk without my Cain. He asked me to moved my neck left, right, up and down. I couldn’t go far as he wanted and he kept asking me to go far. I have discs replaced in my neck but he still asking me to move it more. Now I’m in serious pain. I hope nothing bad happens in my neck when I get the ex-ray back. With all the degrees that he claims he has. He must go back for the respect degree which is the most important degree he should have before thinking of working around people.

originalText.text: Save yourself the aggravation of coming to this disgrace of an office. Staff is so rude , literally lied to my face telling me they canceled the appointment after I drove over and hour and a half from another state. I proceeded to tell them this is the second time you have canceled on me and shaniqua ( don’t know how to spell her name ) literally told me the last time you came late so we canceled on you. Let me say not only was this a flat out lie. They canceled on me before my appointment and I only found out BECAUSE I CALLED TO CONFIRM IT. Imagine that !!!

originalText.text: Extremely unprofessional and very rude doctor. I would recommend others to stay away from him for any services, especially if they are looking for someone who has compassion.
